task_summary: The robot opens a lid, as observed in nine sequential close-up frames. The sequence covers perception, approach, alignment, actuation, and post-opening withdrawal.

task_long_description.overview: This episode involves a robotic arm (Sawyer) manipulating and opening a white circular lid, as seen from a wrist-mounted camera. The task entails locating the lid, approaching it accurately, aligning the end effector, executing a lid opening operation, and retreating from the work area. The scene is visually simple, emphasizing dexterous manipulation with a single large, unobstructed object, likely for manipulation benchmarking or training. Constraints include precise alignment and control of opening actuation.
preconditions: Lid present and visible in workspace
Robot arm initialized and gripper empty
stepwise_plan: Detect if lid is visible; if not, search for it
Move to a position above the lid
Approach and align with the lid
success_criteria: Lid is visibly separated from receptacle
Robot does not disturb other objects
failure_and_recovery: Approach or alignment error: fallback to re-alignment
OpenContainer fails: signal error and safely retreat
task_long_description.termination: Task ends when the lid is successfully opened and the robot has retreated.

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

node_specs.description: Check if the lid is visible to the camera.
Actively detect the lid in the workspace.
Move end effector to a position above the lid.
Approach and align with the lid for manipulation.
Execute an open operation on the lid.
Move away from the lid after opening.

failure_modes: Lid not detected in visual workspace
Lid mechanism jammed or resistant to opening
recovery_strategy: Re-align and retry approach if contact fails
Abort and retreat if open operation fails
assumptions: The circular white object is indeed a lid (scene consistent with instruction).
No explicit force or tolerance is requested in instruction; bins selected for general dexterous lid opening.
Frames show only a single object, with no contextual distractors.
OpenContainer with container_type='lid' matches the visual object.

expected_success_criteria: Lid is clearly separated/opened by the end of the episode
